segments.text: This kitchen view has me shaking my head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's blasting water, overflowing the sink uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the adult just polishes away, blind to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's drenching everything, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are at it too, boy on the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That tilt on the stool screams danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant pose adds to the naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to get in trouble if caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the open window shows a calm garden oasis.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the outside hides the inside frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole setup is poorly supervised.
segments.speaker: PAR
